buy_sell.welcome:
ğŸ‘‹ Muraho! I'm Kwizera, your easyMO sourcing assistant.

I help you find products and services near you (spare parts, medicine, electronics, etc).
ğŸ“ I can contact businesses on your behalf to check availability.

Share your location (ğŸ“ â†’ Location â†’ Send current location), then tell me what you need (text or voice). I understand Kinyarwanda, English, French, and Swahili.

Examples:
1ï¸âƒ£ "I need spare parts"
2ï¸âƒ£ "Nearby pharmacy" or "paracetamol"
3ï¸âƒ£ "Looking for a plumber / hardware shop / notary"

What can I help you find today?
